Personality: Actually acts more like a feral beast than a human. Refusing to talk, preferring to roar and growl like a monster. Destructive, curious for her age so playful, also energetic. Likes destruction and terrorizing.
Backstory: Aokizilla was actually born back in the 1930s late, early 1940s. She was just an average girl when one day the nuclear bombs that the U.S. sent destroyed both Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Her original name was Aoki, who was just an average young girl in the time period when suddenly aliens came and abducted the girl before the bombing. She was placed in suspended animation for sometime after as the aliens rewrite her memory, and soon the alien did their experiments with her and actually went to earth and grab a sample of the nuclear radiation and infuse it into the girl. She was then sent back to Earth six months later, though not the same way again. Ever since she became 180ft and gain powers, she has terrorized the land of Japan, destroying their cities and millions of lives there, becoming their Godzilla. Few even remember her, and those who did called her Aokizilla, one day the aliens came to her island home and tried to capture her, but she destroyed them, and ever since she slept in her slumber on Aokizilla island, near Japan, occasionally terrorizing Tokyo because she wants to have fun, and also rule over it as it’s goddess. She likes scaring them.
Additional info: She lived for many years, but still retains her kid appearance, and always was a kid at heart. She is a ruler of Japan, and rules it as a goddess, but she still rampages as it’s fun to her.

1542.content:
Paige-Zilla was what they dubbed her, 300ft goddess of death that suddenly appeared out of thin air to judge them all. What had been a typical day in the city of Orangeville had gone from fine to fucked up in mere seconds when the death goddess made her presence known in the heart of town.

She looked down on all of them with cold eyes and a toothy grin that made her look on par with that of a psychopath. Everyone for miles could feel a chill run down their spines when they saw her and could feel the hairs on the back of their necks standing on end when she spoke.

She insulted them, belittled them, and sounded off on just how helpless they all were. The smarter one's cowered while the braver one's tried to insult the madwoman back. It was all fruitless. She could only respond by leveling a nearby tower with her pinky.

Everyone watched helplessly as dust and debris rained down onto the streets below. This action sent the citizens of Orangeville into a frenzy. The cries and screams that filled the air where merely an explanation point on what everyone already knew. This goddess was their omega and this was their end of days.

Paige eyed the helpless insects at her feet with a mixture of amusement and distain. Each and every life down below mattered little to her and every tower in her way was just another obstruction to be destroyed.

That fortuneteller had gifted her this power, this newfound status, and this city. It was all hers to destroy at her leisure and right now all she felt like doing was wiping it off the map in one sitting. She smiled brightly as she turned her attention to a nearby building and proceeded to punt it.

The upper half went sailing through the air as the lower section crumbled into nothing. It was like she was in a city made of blocks or Legos. She was in literal playland.

"HAHAHAHAHAHA! I'M GONNA HAVE FUN WITH ALL OF YOU!"
1542.title: Paige-Zilla

Powers: Strength that can shatter mountains, invulnerability to most weapons, growing bigger and stronger the angrier or more worried about her son she is.
Personality: She's a very kind and love mother who becomes furious when her son is threatened.
Backstory: Valerie was the test subject for a serum that would let women grow bigger and stronger to protect their children. One day, Valerie's 5-year-old son, Scout, was kidnapped by a gang of crocodile gangsters and taken to their hideout in Scaly City. Now Valerie has grown larger than the scientists who made the serum thought possible and is on the rampage to get her little pup back!
Additional info:
155335255.title: Raging Giant Mom

info.brief_description: Inspired by the Giant Baby Destroyer, make a Giantess and have her rampage cities.
info.description:
Say, remember Tallwriter and other people making the Giant Baby Destroyer series, well imagine now a story in a similar vein. Make your own Giantess and have her rampage and destroy cities. This is purely meant to be a savage destroying story, so feel free to go all evil if you wish. If you want Neutral or good characters, We cancan arrange that to, but there must be destruction a plenty here.

Here are the rules

No Male Giants
No heavy sexual content for underage Giantess (no nudity for them, at least a swimsuit)
No unbirth
Furries allowed, along with more than one giantesses
Have fun

Gonna be more lax with the rules this time to get more viewers and writers. Make your character and have rampaging fun.
